channel.title: 'Not a statement' error after decompiling class Gui
channel.description:
I decompiled the DS client so I can use it and I'm getting two errors..
if I removed the statement I get even more errors, l0l [code]Gui.java:270: not a statement for (localJMenuItem1 ; arrayOfJButton) { ^ Gui.java:270: ';' expected for (localJMenuItem1 ; arrayOfJButton) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
